name: orchestrator-simulator
description: Aplicação simuladora para teste de fluxos do Orquestrador, Workers, componentes de IA (FSB, ACE, RAG) e integrações externas

scripts.build: npm run build -w @simulator/backend && npm run build -w @simulator/frontend
scripts.test: npm run test -w @simulator/backend && npm run test -w @simulator/frontend
scripts.lint: npm run lint -w @simulator/backend && npm run lint -w @simulator/frontend
